name: Refugee
description: This was a GCC sound design 2018 - 2019 class project about the reality of the Arizona/Mexico border.   All content was created by the students.  Programming and non-music/audio assets created by the instructor Rob Esler.  The game is meant to tell you the real stories and experiences of those people trying to cross the border.  There is no shooting or violence.  Just a dark, Arizona desert.   This is experimental and in its beta release.  Thanks for checking it out.
